feed.title: onion addresses to try [At least 17% of Bitcoin Core 24.x listening nodes are running full-rbf]

entry.title: onion addresses to try [At least 17% of Bitcoin Core 24.x listening nodes are running full-rbf]
entry.summary: On December 22, 2022, Peter Todd posted on the bitcoin-dev forum about a lack of convenient sources for onion addresses to try. Responding to this post, Vasil Dimov offered a solution in the form of a command that can be run in the terminal: "bitcoin-cli getnodeaddresses 0 |jq -r 'map(select(.network == "onion")) | .[].address'". He signed off his email with a quote regarding the importance of living life to the fullest.
